Name: Stela fragment
Description: This fragment of a stela depicts a standing person resting his right hand on a staff. He is dressed in a short kilt and in a band that crosses his chest. He wears a necklace and a chain of amulets. Behind him follows a standing woman, her right hand on her breast, the other alongside the body.  On her head-dress is a lotus flower. The scene is surmounted by an inscription the fragmentary state of which prevents a reading. The monument bears many traces of polychromy.
